title: 16xypjnxlrew
author: 16xypjnxlrew
content: Hi! I'm looking urgent for a 0.0005-1 BTC loan for personal gaming. I'm willing to pay 10-20 USDT back a 4 weeks. I don't have collateral, but I do have my freebitco.in account. You can view my entire account history and see that I have won very large sums before. I am ready to go to a lawyer to sign all the necessary documents, if I don't repay the loan, you will recover the loan from me in court. I will gladly go through KYC and any other information here. I promise you that these BTC will not be lost in the gamble. Thanks you!

comments.author: marcotheminer
comments.body: You should just post this in the lending section. 4 weeks may not be considered 'long-term' enough.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: marcotheminer on August 02, 2022, 11:17:38 AMYou should just post this in the lending section. 4 weeks may not be considered 'long-term' enough.I will give this amount every 4 weeks, but for more than a year

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 02, 2022, 06:04:29 AMYou can view my entire account history and see that I have won very large sums before. assuming that is true, where did you spend those large sums when you now have to ask for a loan (I understood you earlier that you were even homeless)? So at some point, you still had a lot of money in your hands, but somehow you spent it irresponsibly, why would anyone believe you this time?

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 02, 2022, 12:58:32 PMassuming that is true, where did you spend those large sums when you now have to ask for a loan (I understood you earlier that you were even homeless)? So at some point, you still had a lot of money in your hands, but somehow you spent it irresponsibly, why would anyone believe you this time?Yes, it's true, when I won at freebitco.in I wanted more and more and because of this I did not stop and lost everything. I followed according to their table to win up to 20 BTC

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 02, 2022, 06:04:29 AMI am ready to go to a lawyer to sign all the necessary documents, if I don't repay the loan, you will recover the loan from me in court.How are you going to pay for the lawyer?You have scams going in three or four sections simultaneously.Give up.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 02, 2022, 06:04:29 AMI am ready to go to a lawyer to sign all the necessary documents, if I don't repay the loan, you will recover the loan from me in court.What if you squander it on cocaine and hookers?  The court can only issue an order to pay, but no judge can squeeze juice from a dry lemon.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.created_time: August 05, 2022, 02:59:24 AMLast edit: August 06, 2022, 11:23:02 AM by 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on August 04, 2022, 02:02:32 PMHow are you going to pay for the lawyer?You have scams going in three or four sections simultaneously.Give up.I don't have to pay for a free lawyer because it's free. What non-existent scams are you talking about? Every time you write a scam, but don't say where it is. Where is it? Find it!

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 02, 2022, 06:04:29 AMloan for personal gaming.~Snipped~but I do have my freebitco.in account.If by gaming, you're referring to gambling-related stuff, then do you mind providing a simple answer as to why that should count as an urgent matter [as stated in the subject field]?Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 02, 2022, 06:04:29 AMI will gladly go through KYC and any other information here.Up to what extent? If you were thinking going through a simple KYC process would be sufficient for this kind of loan, I highly doubt it'd be good enough simply because of the fact that it's not that hard to gather fake documents [unfortunately]!Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 02, 2022, 06:04:29 AMI promise you that these BTC will not be lost in the gamble.Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on August 02, 2022, 02:31:51 PMwhen I won at freebitco.in I wanted more and more and because of this I did not stop and lost everything. I followed according to their table to win up to 20 BTCHow can you make that kind of promise with such a track record?!

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: This is how I know the OP is lying:Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=131361;dt 16xypjnxlrew    2021-12-11        Accomplice TheQuin

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.created_time: August 06, 2022, 10:41:17 AMLast edit: August 06, 2022, 11:28:17 AM by 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: I REGRET      to inform everyone that I am no longer looking for a loan, because I from today I don't play on freebitco.in anymore because it's NOT Provably Fair!Quote from: Timelord2067 on August 06, 2022, 09:24:59 AMThis is how I know the OP is lying:Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=131361;dt 16xypjnxlrew    2021-12-11        Accomplice TheQuinThis is how I know the Timelord2067 is lying:Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=2705665 Timelord2067    2021-04-28        Trolling the freebitco.in thread with hostile comments. https://archive.ph/IYyoB#selection-8171.0-8171.126Quote from: SFR10 on August 06, 2022, 09:03:41 AMIf by gaming, you're referring to gambling-related stuff, then do you mind providing a simple answer as to why that should count as an urgent matter [as stated in the subject field]?Urgent because I'm playing with a x10 multiplier, there was a big losing streak, so there will be wins right now. Therefore, urgently! At the moment, I am no longer looking for a loan of 0.005-1 BTC because I am no longer playing on this site from today.I started looking for Angel Investors to buy a secret coin (not a token) that will give up to x30 profit - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5408545.0

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: One of Albert Einstein's famous saying was great, wasn't it? “Insanity Is Doing the Same Thing Over and Over Again and Expecting Different Results” and OP is just showing us a live example of insanity and dumbness of the highest order.16xypjnxlrew whether you want to jerk-off on top of the Great Egyptian Pyramids or go and take a shit in the middle of a busy highway, you are not going to get a loan in this forum.
